text:
Hiya mate, don't worry about it... Enjoy your time off I know it's a rarity haha.

I see what your saying. So matte painting is definitely something that I really want to work on because I like the idea of really weathering a location to make it look abandoned kinda something like the walking dead, or making a location look so unfamiliar yet also gets people thinking.. wait isn't that such and such a place?.. that kind of thing.

Is matte painting an actual job within itself or is that something that will be done in most role as a compositor?

We've got until January 10th so 3 months from now almost to the day :ok_hand::skin-tone-3:
Also no rush in replying especially whilst your on holiday... Hope your somewhere nice :ok_hand::skin-tone-3:
